product_name: Backpacker's Pantry Organic Oats and Quinoa Cereal
long_description: Start your day on the trail with this healthy blend of Organic Oats and Quinoa Cereal from Backpacker's Pantry. Add 1-1/4 cup of boiling water to the ingredients in the bag. Stir well. Seal bag and let sit for 5 minutes. Stir and serve. All-organic ingredients; choose from Cinnamon Apple or Banana Raisin. Contains milk and gluten. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Start your day on the trail with this healthy blend of Organic Oats and Quinoa Cereal from Backpacker's Pantry.
